title: What are some examples of African high culture? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would look at the major auction houses to see how much some African art sells for. Sotheby’s sold some tribal carving for phenomenal prices for example. The art is Also look at Zimbabwean Soapstone culture and Ashanti gold work. African is not a single tribe or country. Read the works of the major African writers also. Africa has a had many lauded writers like booker prize winners an nominees.

Africa is NOT a nation or a single ethnic group. It's a very large continent with a multitude of people's and nation's on it. The question cannot be answered in its current format. Please rephrase your question so that it addresses a single nation or people.
